In summary, experts highlight strong but not dominant odds for May 2025 being the hottest May on record, with a central probability range around 40–70%—well above the long-term base rate, but acknowledging the increasing challenge of setting new records after an exceptional previous year and the moderating effect of developing La Niña conditions.
